original_text: Then it shall come to pass, that the sword, which ye feared, shall overtake you there in the land of Egypt, and the famine, whereof ye were afraid, shall follow close after you there in Egypt; and there ye shall die.
korean_text: 너희가 두려워하는 칼이 애굽 땅으로 따라가서 너희에게 미칠 것이요 너희가 두려워하는 기근이 애굽으로 급히 따라가서 너희에게 임하리니 너희가 거기에서 죽을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Then it shall come to pass
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 그 일이 이루어질 것이라

sentences.original_text: that the sword, which ye feared, shall overtake you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 두려워했던 칼이 너희를 따라잡을 것이며

sentences.original_text: there in the land of Egypt
and the famine, whereof ye were afraid, shall follow close after you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 두려워했던 기근이 너희 뒤를 바좇 따를 것이며
